__e: Papa says if it doesn't hurt anybody, it's not dishonest in your heart.

You know, if I have to spend my life as someone else - I'd be honoured to be you.
What I mean is, I'm very honored to have this chance.

I'd be honoured to have you in my team, but if you don't choose me I am happy that you're on the show.
Well, I am honored to be a part of your family, sir.
